resources.string: Password must contain 8 characters or more.

Sometimes it’s hard for us to explain feelings and know exactly what is the thing
 that makes us feel that way.
lets you rate your daily activities

and look for patterns that affect your mood.

 It allows you to make reflection a daily habit, discover what makes you happy
 or sad and depressed,
 eventually empowering you with actual statistics to make a change
 for a better mental health.
Report at any time regarding your moods,\n connecting it to an activity and following\n by adding notes.
Travel back in time and review all the reports\n of a specific month or another date.
Based on a specific mood or activity\n of your chosen,\n you’ll be able to see reports regarding it.
For motivation,\n a daily uplifting quote will be visible.
Choose a day/month for Daily/Monthly report:
What\'s the activity that caused it?
If Month selected, choose a random day in calendar.

string-array.name: quotes_array
string-array.item: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Don\'t be upset when people reject you. Nice things are rejected all the time by people who can\'t afford them.
It\'s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.
People who wonder if the glass is half empty or full miss the point. The glass is refillable.
Whenever you find yourself doubting how far you can go, just remember how far you have come.
Don\'t tell everyone your plans, instead show them your results.
Always be careful when you follow the masses. Sometimes the m is silent.
When Plan “A” does not work, don’t worry, you still have 25 more letters to go through.
At any given moment you have the power to say: this is not how the story is going to end.
A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
When you know your worth, no one can make you feel worthless.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Forget your excuses. You either want it bad or don’t want it at all.
When thinking about life, remember this: no amount of guilt can change the past and no amount of anxiety can change the future.
Never regret a day in your life. Good days bring you happiness and bad days give you experience.
If you are the smartest person in the room, you’re in the wrong room.
Be strong enough to let go and wise enough to wait for what you deserve.
Your mind is powerful. When you fill it with positive thoughts your whole world will change.
Stop being afraid of what can go wrong and start being positive about what can go right.
The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
Repeat: I will not erase all my hard work this week because it is the weekend.
You will never always be motivated, so you must learn to be disciplined.
Breakdowns can create breakthroughs. Things fall apart so things can fall together.
A bend in the road is not the end of the road, unless you fail to make the turn.
The stars are constantly shining, but often we do not see them until the dark hours.
Count the garden by the flowers, never by the leaves that fall. Count your life with smiles and not the tears that roll.
Keep your head and your heart going in the right direction and you will not have to worry about your feet.
Mistakes are a great educator when one is honest enough to admit them and willing to learn from them.
You can make the dream come true if you wake up and work.
Your dreams will come true if you can see it, if you believe in it, then you can achieve it.
You are on the road to success when you realize that failure is only a detour.
Don\'t be just another member of society, be a living example of your dreams and goals.
Failure is not the worst thing in the world, the very worst is not to try.
Remember that your failures are the seeds of your most glorious successes. Be sad if you must, but do not despair.
Those who can, do.\nThose who can not, criticize.
All of us could take a lesson from the weather, it pays no attention to criticism.
Many great ideas have been lost because the people who had them could not stand being laughed at.
Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it by the handle of anxiety, or by the handle of faith.
If you don\'t believe in yourself,\nchances are nobody else will.
If you don\'t get everything you want, think of the things you don\'t get that you don\'t want.
The man who really wants to do something finds a way, the other finds an excuse.
We accomplish things by directing our desires, not by ignoring them.
Real leaders are ordinary people with extraordinary determination.
Faithful friends are gifts from heaven: Whoever finds one has found a treasure.
Humor is a whisper from the soul, imploring mind and body to relax, let go and be at peace again.
Anyone who thinks the sky is the limit, has limited imagination.
The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so.
